statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 11 \\ 6 \\ -11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ -24 \\ -16 \\ 24 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ 68 \\ 44 \\ -68 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
